type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer
type.summary: Comes as a provider of the type for the UI Automation technology.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer.#ctor(Elysium.Controls.ToggleSwitch)
method.summary: Creates a new instance of the class .
method.param: An instance of the class , for which the provider will be used.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer.Owner
property.summary: An instance of the successor of the class , for which the provider will be used.
property.value: An instance of the control , for which the provider will be used.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer.GetClassNameCore
method.summary: Returns such a class name , which is connected with current object. This method is called by .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlTypeCore
method.summary: Returns a type of the control for the control , which is connected with current object . This method is called by .
method.ensures: The being returned value is a value of AutomationControlType.Slider .

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer.GetPattern(System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface)
method.summary: Returns a template of the control for an instance of the control , which is connected with current object .
method.returns: If the parameter has a value , the method will return "this", otherwise "null" will be returned.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer.Toggle
method.summary: Toggles the state of the control.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Automation.ToggleSwitchAutomationPeer.ToggleState
property.summary: Returns a state of the control (from the number of states, in which the control can toggle)
property.value: One from the values of the enumeration .
